item.title: The Outlier Effect And Your Success
item.description:
Is a feeling of sadness common for you during this time of year? It’s understandable, particularly when the excitement of the holidays fades and life slows down. It’s a time when we reflect on our accomplishments and disappointments. And then we come across stories about overnight successes, making us question if some people are just wired for success while others aren’t. Malcolm Gladwell’s book, “Outliers,” challenges the notion of what truly defines success...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-outlier-effect-and-your-success/

item.title: Starting on July 29, upgrades to Windows 10 will be available for free
item.description:
Source: Windows blog. Microsoft has revealed that Windows 10 will launch on July 29th in 190 countries. The company states that Windows 10 will enhance productivity and offer a more personalized and intuitive user experience across devices. Windows 7 and 8.1 users can upgrade to Windows 10 for free, making it accessible to a majority of current Windows users. “Windows 10 empowers users to achieve remarkable things,” says Terry Myerson, Executive VP at Microsoft...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/starting-on-july-29-upgrades-to-windows-10-will-be-available-for-free/

item.title: The initial significant update is now accessible for Windows 10
item.description:
Source: Microsoft. Microsoft has released its first significant update for Windows 10, available for both PCs and tablets. This update brings enhancements across the platform, improving user experience according to the company’s official announcement. The rollout of Windows 10 has also begun for Xbox One and is expected to reach selected mobile phones shortly. Terry Myerson, Executive VP of Microsoft’s Windows and Devices Group, expressed confidence in the update, stating that it marks a level of platform maturity suitable for organization-wide deployment...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-initial-significant-update-is-now-accessible-for-windows-10/

item.title: Acer unveils three convertible notebooks
item.description:
Acer has expanded its line of 2-in-1 notebooks with the new 11.6" Aspire Switch 11 series and a new Switch 10 featuring a 1080p Full HD 10.1" display. The Aspire Switch 2-in-1 series combines a Microsoft Windows notebook and tablet in one device. Source: Acer. The Aspire Switch 10. The Aspire Switch series is thin, lightweight, and durable, designed for work and travel. It supports four modes: touch, typing, viewing, and sharing...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/acer-unveils-three-convertible-notebooks/

item.title: The launch of Windows 10 in Singapore is met with great excitement
item.description:
The Windows 10 launch event in Singapore was a resounding success, drawing a large crowd. Microsoft’s Windows 10 is now widely accessible, offered as a free upgrade for a limited time or with new computer systems and tablets in 190 countries. This latest version introduces features like Windows Hello, Cortana, an Xbox app, and the Microsoft Edge browser, aiming to deliver a familiar yet enhanced user experience. Jessica Tan, Managing Director of Microsoft Singapore, highlighted that Windows 10 empowers individuals and groups to achieve remarkable things...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-launch-of-windows-10-in-singapore-is-met-with-great-excitement/
